column1: (1)Time In / Time Out: Military time (8AM = 0800, Midnight = 2400) 15 Minute increments only (0815 or 0830 or 0845)
(2)Lunch is  in 15 (.25) minute increments: 0.50 = 30 minutes; .75 = 45 minutes, 1.0 = 1 hour and so on
(3)This is Washington State Sick Leave and should be used for Washington State employees only
(4)Overtime hours are any hours over 40 hours worked in a week.
NOTE: Please do not enter Holiday Time unless hours were worked. Payroll issues Holiday pay to each eligible employee
